settings.title: Need help? We’re here to save the day!

settings.question: How do I exchange/return an order?
settings.answer:
We’ve kept exchanges and returns simple and clear with these four steps: Request, Ship, Shipment Received, and Refund.

1. Request
If you’re not fully satisfied with your purchase, you can request an exchange or return within 7 days of receiving it. Just go to our returns page, enter your order number and the email or phone number you used at checkout, and select the item(s) you’d like to exchange or return. Our delivery partner will pick up the item within 5-7 working days, and all updates will be sent via email or WhatsApp.

Note: FRAGRANCES, THE SPORT BAG and CAP are not eligible for exchange or return, except in the case of damage upon receipt

2. Ship
Please make sure that the items are unused, in their original packaging, and with the return tag intact. Apparel should be returned unwashed, with all labels still attached.

3. Shipment Received
Once we receive your returned item, we’ll process it as quickly as possible and notify you by email or WhatsApp once it’s done.

4. Refund
Your refund will be credited back to your original payment method within 7 working days.

For any questions, feel free to contact our customer support team!

settings.question: What are the cost for exchange/return of an item?
settings.answer: Your first exchange or return is on us—no extra charges! If you need a second exchange, a prepaid fee of ₹750 will apply.

settings.question: My return arrived at your warehouse more than 7 days ago, but I did not receive my refund yet. What should I do?
settings.answer: We’re sorry for the delay! Please contact our customer support team with your order number and tracking code handy, so we can look into this and resolve it for you as soon as possible.

settings.question: When do I receive my refund?
settings.answer: We’ll process your refund as soon as possible, and no later than 7 days after receiving your return. The refund will be sent to the original payment method used for your order.
